item.title: What you need to know about PostgreSQL timezone
item.description: How many time have you been bitten up by timezone in PostgreSQL? I’m not sure about you but every time I work with timezone, I get f*cked by it. Every single time, I have to reread certain resources and google search again to make sure I am understanding the behavior of it correctly.
